item.title: Videographer Needed for Event in Tuscaloosa, Alabama - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled videographer to capture an upcoming event in Tuscaloosa, Alabama. The ideal candidate will have experience in event videography, with the ability to film and edit high-quality footage. The videographer will be responsible for capturing key moments, interviews, and the overall atmosphere of the event. They must have their own equipment, including a professional camera, tripod, and audio recording devices. Attention to detail, creativity, and excellent time management skills are essential. The final deliverables will include a professionally edited video that showcases the highlights of the event.

Skills required:
- Event videography
- Filming and editing
- Attention to detail
- Time management
- Creative storytelling

Size: Small
Duration: Under 1 month
Expertise: Intermediate

Hourly Range: $15.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 04:04 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Videography, Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Country: USA
click to apply

item.title: $200 for 120 second video? Female Australian content creator needed - Upwork
item.description:
$200 for a 120 second video?

1 simple video could lead to ongoing work (we need lots of videos every month)

We are a company that helps tradies with their admin www.trade-va.com

We are looking for female creators who want to make easy money shooting a professional video promoting our service.

We will do ALL the editing.

We will give you the script of exactly what to say.

We will even give you an example video so you know HOW to say it.

This is really lucrative easy work for someone who is charismatic on camera and cam communicate clearly.




Budget: $100
Posted On: June 29, 2024 03:58 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Female, Teen, Voice-Over
Skills: Female, Teen, Voice-Over
Country: Australia

item.title: Facebook and YouTube Video Ad for Long Distance Ride Sharing Services - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented video editor to create a professional Facebook and YouTube video ad for our long distance ride sharing services. The ad should be visually appealing, engaging, and effectively communicate the benefits of our service. The video should highlight the convenience, affordability, and safety of our rides, as well as showcase some key features.

  Skills required:
  - Video editing
  - Motion graphics
  - Storytelling
  - Creative thinking

  Size: Medium
  Duration: 1 to 3 months
  Expertise: Intermediate

Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 03:51 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Facebook, Video Editing, Social Media Marketing, Graphic Design

item.title: Professional Facebook and YouTube Video Ad Creation - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking an experienced freelancer to create a professional Facebook and YouTube video ad for our brand. The ad should effectively promote our products/services and engage our target audience. The ideal candidate should possess strong video editing skills, creativity, and a deep understanding of the Facebook and YouTube advertising platforms. The selected freelancer will be responsible for conceptualizing, scripting, and producing the ad, including selecting appropriate visuals, music, and voiceover. The ad should be visually appealing, concise, and persuasive.    

Skills needed:
- Video editing
- Creativity
- Facebook advertising
- YouTube advertising

Hourly Range: $6.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 29, 2024 03:20 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial, Adobe Premiere Pro, Facebook
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Commercial, Adobe Premiere Pro, Facebook
Country: Canada
click to apply
